title.narrative: Community Basket: A Fraternal Alliance between the Country and the City

description.narrative: This project, implemented by the Utopia Foundation, will operate in five areas in Ecuador where the “Land and Basket” Network of Consumers and Agroecological Farmers works. Consumers are often unaware of the origin and quality of their foods, and the prices of quality products are generally too high for low-income families. To deal with this, consumers have organized a network linking them directly with farmers. This network is just beginning and its operation and structure are still developing. To improve this situation Heifer will help strengthen the network nationally as a mechanism to organize alternative marketing for small farmers’ produce and to influence public policies. The project will also improve the operation of the network, which will increase the agroecological products distributed and the number of participating families, and will train health promoters to publicize the benefits of eating healthy food. A total of 1,460 families will participate—1,100 original and 360 through passing on the gift.
